Package automat

Interface Summary
PaintHabitatEventObserver This interface needs to be implemented in all classes that receive PaintHabitatEvent-events.
ReferenceSystem2D This interface is to be implemented by all classes that support a restricted 2-dimensional-coordinate-system.
Visitor To be implemented by all classes that need to visit cells within a habitat.
 

Class Summary
CellInformation Contains information about a cell.
CellularAutomat Implements a cellular automat that can be simulated within a thread.
CollectCommandsVisitor Collects the actions to be performed on the habitat.
Coordinate Coordinates in 2d
Environment Represents a cells environment.
Habitat Represents a set of cells to be used by a cellular automat.
Inhabitant Represents an inhabitant (e.g.: something that sits in a cell)
PaintHabitatEvent Asynchronous event that informs the receiver that a new generation of the CA is ready to be displayd.
 

Enum Summary
Direction Defines the possible directions.
